contentInfo.text:
The Cleveland Cavaliers and former No. 7 overall pick Killian Hayes have
agreed to a deal, agent Yann Balikouzou of @LIFTSPORTSMNGMT told @hoopshype.
He averaged 9.0 points on 38% from 3-point range, 5.2 assists and 3.0 rebounds
during six games with the Brooklyn Nets last season

克里夫蘭騎士與第7順位Killian Hayes同意一紙合約。他去年替籃網打的6場比賽中場均9
分3籃板5.2助攻並有38%的三分命中率。

心得:

去年在G聯盟則是場均20.7/5.5/7.6/2.4/0.5 三圍48.0/41.7/75.0

--
